Tutorial for compressing your own videos (if you want)

1. Download handbrake
2. select source filename and destination filename
3. in video tab, choose:
   3.1. constant quality 23
   3.2. x264 tune, still image
   everything else default
4. in audio tab, choose bitrate 80 (it's enough)
5. do so for every video file, go to step 2
